name: 雪鹰领主
description: Snow Eagle Lord, a magnum opus of Oriental immortals, is an aesthetic new world! "Snow Eagle Lord" is a 3-D beauty fairy swordsman game. It's also a real and fantastic world of games, rich and varied equipment, special effects and gorgeous skills, and a good battle will definitely give you an excellent experience. Players can experience high-quality game experience by simplifying operations, releasing skills automatically and innovating ways of playing. Easy upgrade, chatter on the battlefield, enjoy the super pleasure of worship! Off-line hang-up, fair trade, on-line login to send the best magenta, civilian players no longer need to worry! Come on, fight side by side with your brothers! Let's write a story of fairy chivalry without regret!
developers: 霍尔果斯长风骑士网络科技有限公司
publishers: 上海三唐信息技术有限公司
